parts.correct_answer:
Complete the text with the correct words.
Success is never simple. Sometimes you face an obstacle that feels too heavy to move. At other times, you may feel discouraged when your first attempt does not work as planned. However, it is important to have the courage to try again, even when others doubt you. If you continue to keep going, every small step brings you closer to success.
